title: Stockbot: Grocery Robotics
description: Developed a comprehensive simulation in Mujoco for an autonomous grocery restocking robot. Engineered kinematic models and path-planning algorithms in Python to optimize efficiency in a retail environment.

modalContent.value: Developed a comprehensive simulation in Mujoco for an autonomous grocery restocking robot. Engineered kinematic models and path-planning algorithms in Python to optimize efficiency and accuracy in a dynamic retail environment.

This project was a capstone for my undergraduate studies, showcasing the integration of advanced simulation with robotic control theory. The final system demonstrated a significant potential for reducing manual labor and improving inventory management in a simulated retail setting.
